txt.en: Defeat Shakolam and collect his bracer
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Shakolam has been seen patrolling the Orc-made road through the Balewood, towards the southern edge.
'Well done, [placeholder]! This trophy will be a lively addition to my ever-growing collection.'

'Hail, [placeholder]! I hear you are quite the foe-hunter in these parts. Perhaps we can work together, eh?

'I am a collector of odds and ends -- trophies of the enemy. I believe that someday they will be of great historical value, you see.

'A cruel war-mongering Uruk-hai named Shakolam has been seen patrolling the southern Orc-made road in the Balewood. Will you bring me his bracer? I'll see that you are amply rewarded.'
Shakolam can be found on the southern part of the Orc-made road in the Balewood.\n\nYou should summon and defeat Shakolam, and collect his bracer.
Britric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have collected the bracer of Shakolam, and should now return to Forlaw to collect your bounty.
